alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 7:24PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 724 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Way, or 7 miles northeast of Canton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sharon and Camden around 730 PM CST. Farmhaven and Cameron around 735 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Mississippi.
